text: Thanks for agreeing to chat with me on prospela, seems like a great idea! I gather you work for Blue Zoo? I applied for one of the summer internships there recently but didn't get it unfortunately.

Just a bit about my background, I started out doing character design and illustration but recently have discovered a passion for storyboarding! Just trying now to build a portfolio and get some initial freelance work, any tips or direction you could give would be much appreciated, have you ever mentored anyone before?
